title: 【1.8】生机盎然 full of life (photo realistic) [128x128] 美丽，好看，卡通
author: 雨天风
txt_content:
New video :D 

So, This is the full of life resource pack :D Before you start browsing the images I'd like to tell you that the textures in the screenshots might change overtime! 

custom music for disc 13, cat and the selection menu (the one when you start minecraft) 





是不是很好看哪
下载地址 http://pan.baidu.com/s/1gdzrzbX
